fields.name: bin
fields.label: BIN
fields.description: The Building Identification Number (BIN) from NYC Department of Buildings

fields.name: borough
fields.label: Borough
fields.description: The borough the property is located in

fields.name: low_street_number
fields.label: Low Street Number
fields.description: The lowest number on the street of the building or vacant lot

fields.name: high_street_number
fields.label: High Street Number
fields.description: The highest number on the street of the building or vacant lot

fields.name: address
fields.label: Address
fields.description: Text of the address with the full location as a single entry

fields.name: street_name
fields.label: Street Name
fields.description: An identifying name given to a street

fields.name: addresses
fields.label: All Addresses
fields.description: Complete address for the building

fields.name: postal_code
fields.label: Postal Code
fields.description: Identifies the postal delivery area the building is in

fields.name: state_or_province
fields.label: State or Province
fields.description: The state or province the poperty is located in

fields.name: country
fields.label: Country
fields.description: The country the property is located in

fields.name: year_built
fields.label: Year Built
fields.description: The year that the building was constructed

fields.name: year_last_altered
fields.label: Year Last Altered
fields.description: The year the building was most recently renovated

fields.name: frontage_ft
fields.label: Frontage
fields.description: Building width in feet

fields.name: depth_ft
fields.label: Depth
fields.description: Building length in feet

fields.name: has_doorman
fields.label: Doorman
fields.description: Does the building have a doorman? (Yes/No)

fields.name: doorman_type
fields.label: Doorman Type
fields.description: Doorman type (Full-Time/Part-Time)

fields.name: has_concierge
fields.label: Concierge
fields.description: Does the building have a concierge? (Yes/No)

fields.name: concierge_type
fields.label: Concierge Type
fields.description: Concierge type (Full-Time/Part-Time)

fields.name: has_lobby_attendant
fields.label: Lobby Attendant
fields.description: Does the building have a lobby attendant? (Yes/No)

fields.name: lobby_attendant_type
fields.label: Lobby Attendant Type
fields.description: Description of the lobby attendent (Full Time/Part Time)

fields.name: elevator_count
fields.label: Elevator Number
fields.description: Total elevators in building

fields.name: has_elevator
fields.label: Elevator
fields.description: Does the building have an elevator? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_gym
fields.label: Gym
fields.description: Does the building have a gym? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_sauna
fields.label: Sauna
fields.description: Does the building have a sauna? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_spa
fields.label: Spa
fields.description: Does the building have a spa? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_yoga
fields.label: Yoga
fields.description: Does the building have a yoga facility? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_steam_room
fields.label: Steam Room
fields.description: Does the building have a steam room? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_garage
fields.label: Garage
fields.description: Does the building have a garage? (Yes/No)

fields.name: parking_type
fields.label: Parking Type
fields.description: Parking description if building has parking available

fields.name: has_parking_valet
fields.label: Parking Valet
fields.description: Does the building have a parking valet? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_laundry_each_floor
fields.label: Laundry on Every Floor
fields.description: Does the building have laundry facilities in each floor? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_laundry_facility
fields.label: Laundry
fields.description: Does the building have a laundry facility? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_pool
fields.label: Pool
fields.description: Does the building have a pool? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_roof_deck
fields.label: Roof Deck
fields.description: Does the building have a roof deck? (Yes/No)

fields.name: foundation_sq_ft
fields.label: Foundation Square Footage
fields.description: Foundation square footage

fields.name: floor_count
fields.label: Number of Floors
fields.description: Total floors in the building

fields.name: all_unit_count
fields.label: Total Number of Units
fields.description: Total units in the building

fields.name: residential_unit_count
fields.label: Total Number of Residential Units
fields.description: Total residential units in the building

fields.name: has_tax_flip
fields.label: Tax Flip
fields.description: Does the building have a tax flip? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_patio
fields.label: Patio
fields.description: Does the building have a patio? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_courtyard
fields.label: Courtyard
fields.description: Does the building have a courtyard? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_garden
fields.label: Garden
fields.description: Does the building have a garden? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_storage
fields.label: Storage
fields.description: Does the building have storage available? (Yes/No)

fields.name: owner_name
fields.label: Owner Name
fields.description: Name of person or entity that owns the building

fields.name: is_wheelchair_accessible
fields.label: Wheelchair Accessible
fields.description: Is the building wheelchair accessible? (Yes/No)

fields.name: year_incorporated
fields.label: Year Incorporated
fields.description: The year the building was converted or incorporated

fields.name: year_converted
fields.label: Year Converted
fields.description: The year the building was converted to condominiums

fields.name: allows_pied_a_terre
fields.label: Pied a Terre allowed?
fields.description: Does the building allow Pied-a-Terres? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_super
fields.label: Super
fields.description: Does the building have a superintendent? (Yes/No)

fields.name: super_type
fields.label: Super Type
fields.description: Superintendent type (Full-Time/Part-Time)

fields.name: has_super_on_site
fields.label: Live-in Super
fields.description: Does a superintendent live on site? (Yes/No)

fields.name: is_pre_wwii
fields.label: PREWWII
fields.description: Was the building built after 1900 and before 1939? (Yes/No)

fields.name: is_pre_wwi
fields.label: PreWWI
fields.description: Was the building built before 1914? (Yes/No)

fields.name: is_new_development
fields.label: New Development
fields.description: Was the building developed within the last seven years? (Yes/No)

fields.name: is_recent_development
fields.label: Recent Development
fields.description: Was the building developed within the last ten years? (Yes/No)

fields.name: neighborhoods
fields.label: Neighborhoods
fields.description: The names of the neighborhoods that the building is located in

fields.name: boundaries_geom
fields.label: Boundaries Geometry
fields.description: Polygon points of the boundary

fields.name: centroid_geom
fields.label: Centroid Geometry
fields.description: Latitude and longitude point of the building centroid

fields.name: bbl
fields.label: BBL
fields.description: Tax Borough, Block, and Lot (BBL).

fields.name: school_district
fields.label: School District
fields.description: 1-6, 10 Manhattan 7-12 Bronx 13-23, 32 Brooklyn 24-30 Queens 31 Staten Island

fields.name: gross_sq_ft
fields.label: Gross Area
fields.description: Total building gross area in square feet

fields.name: basement_grade_type_code
fields.label: Basement Type/Grade
fields.description: Basement grade type codes 0 through 5. See descriptions in basement_grade_type_description field definition.

fields.name: basement_grade_type_description
fields.label: Basement Type/Grade Description
fields.description: 0 None/No Basement 1 Full Basement that is Above Grade The basement is 75% or more of the area of the first floor and the basement walls are at least 4 feet high on at least two sides. 2 Full Basement that is Below Grade The basement is 75% or more of the area of the first floor and the basement walls are fully submerged or are less than 4 feet on at least three sides. 3 Partial Basement that is Above Grade The basement is between 25% and 75% of the area of the first floor and the basement walls are at least 4 feet high on at least two sides. 4 Partial Basement that is Below Grade The basement is between 25% and 75% of the area of the first floor and the basement walls are fully submerged or are less than 4 feet on at least three sides. 5 Unknown

fields.name: unit_ownership_type
fields.label: Unit Ownership Type
fields.description: How individual units are owned in the building

fields.name: class_code
fields.label: Class Code
fields.description: The building class code as defined by the NYC DOB

fields.name: class_description
fields.label: Class Description
fields.description: The building class as defined by the NYC DOB

fields.name: residential_type
fields.label: Residential Building Type
fields.description: Cherre's derived residential building type including (condo vs. co-op and walk-up vs. elevator): - Elevator Apartment - Single Family - Walk Up Apartment - Condo - Other Residential - Walk Up Apartment (Co-op) - Multi Family Home - Walk Up Condo - Multi Family - Elevator Apartment (Co-op) - Single Family Home - Non-residential - Multi Family Walk Up Apartment

fields.name: allows_pets
fields.label: Pets
fields.description: Does the building allow pets? (Yes/No)

fields.name: pet_policy_type
fields.label: Pet Policy Type
fields.description: The type of pet policy the building has, including: - Pets Allowed - No Pets - No Dogs - No Cats - Dogs Under 50 Pounds - Dogs Under 20 Pounds

fields.name: has_balcony
fields.label: Balcony
fields.description: Do units in the building have balconies? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_healthclub
fields.label: Healthclub
fields.description: Does the building have a healthclub? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_terrace
fields.label: Terrace
fields.description: Do units in the building have terraces? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_intercom
fields.label: Intercom
fields.description: Does the building have an intercom? (Yes/No)

fields.name: has_fire_protection
fields.label: Fire Protection
fields.description: Does the building have fire protection? (Yes/No)

fields.name: fire_protection_type
fields.label: Fire Protection Type
fields.description: Defines the type of fire protection in the building: - Fire Alarm - Spinkler System - Fire Suppression

fields.name: exterior_wall_type
fields.label: Exterior Wall Type
fields.description: Defines the type of material the exterior wall of the building is made of

fields.name: siamese_sprinkler_type
fields.label: Siamese Sprinkler Type
fields.description: The type of siamese spinkler for the building according to the FDNY, including: - Flow - Non auto - Perferated pipe - Auto wet - Auto dry - Trip Test - Combination

fields.name: siamese_standpipe_type
fields.label: Simese Standpipe Type
fields.description: The type of siamese standpipe for the building according to the FDNY, including: - Dry - Wet - Other - Combination

fields.name: siamese_standpipe_count
fields.label: Siamese Standpipe Count
fields.description: The number of siamese standpipe for the building according to the FDNY
